name: ECTU - European Shippers' Council
goal: Representing the interests of cargo owners and transport users/shippers in logistics and transportation.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Enterprise, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Consultations submissions and participation in EC meetings on issues relating to any mode of transport - air, maritime, road, rail and inland navigation - as well as intermodality, logistics, supply chain and CO2, reduction of transport emissions, research and innovation in the area of freight transport. But also: transport competition issues, TEN-T, EU Transport White Paper, Road Initiative, digitization, sustainable industry, eco-innovation, transport security (air, maritime) and safety, GHG emissions from road, rail, short sea shipping, motorways of the sea, air cargo, trade facilitation and customs.
